'''Chuck Fowler''' is a student who was shot in the Pacific College shooting.

==History==
Chuck was at Pacific College when Jared Swork came in and started shooting. He suffered a graze wound to his neck and was taken to [[Seattle Grace Mercy West Hospital]].

They debrided his wound and did a vascular repair. However, while [[Alex Karev]] was working on him, Chuck crashed. They were able to resuscitate him and finish his repair.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He was 21 at the time of the shooting.
